attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The value of the field (including any separator characters)

properties.name: rules
properties.description: An object containing a set of named functions used for validation. Method signature is (String char, String input, Object group, HTMLInputElement field) where char is the latest character a user has typed, and input is the full string the user has entered for a given group.

properties.name: restrict
properties.description: An object containing a set of regexes used to test input. If input does not test true, it is not allowed in the field.

properties.name: placeholder
properties.description: Placeholder value. Should contain separator chars as well so it can be properly chunked into individual inputs.

detail.name: value
detail.description: Value of the selected item, usually it's label
